          <title>
            <string language="sl">Reševalni avto vozi z vključeno sireno</string>
            <string language="en">An Ambulance Drives by with its Siren on</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Krankenwagen treibt vorbei mit seiner Sirene 
an an</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une ambulance pilote près avec sa sirène en 
fonction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma ambulância dirige perto com seu siren sobre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'ambulanza guida vicino con la relativa sirena 
sopra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ασθενοφόρο κοντά με τη σειρήνα του επάνω</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una ambulancia conduce cerca con su sirena 
encendido</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Demonstracija dopplerjevega pojava na primeru avta s sireno.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of Doppler effect in case of moving car with siren.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dopplerjev pojav</string>
            <string language="en">doppler effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zvok</string>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration des Doppler Effektes falls von 
beweglichem Auto mit Sirene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration d'effet de Doppler en cas de 
voiture en mouvement avec la sirène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração do efeito de doppler caso que de 
carro movente com siren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione di effetto di doppler nel caso 
dell'automobile commovente con la sirena.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της επίδρασης Doppler σε περίπτωση κίνησης
του αυτοκινήτου με τη σειρήνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración del efecto de Doppler en caso de 
que del coche móvil con la sirena.</string>
          </description>
